Elsie Bruam

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Elsie Bruan
  2. Foster Name: Elsie
  3. Foster Family: Gustaf E. and Selma Peterson
  4. Location of Family: Axtell, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Minden, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 6
  8. Date of Birth: 6/10/1901, New York City, NY
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Elsie Freeland
  11. Spouse Name: Earl Freeland
  12. Source: 1920 United States Federal Census; Minden Courier, 29 August 1907.
